title: Office Coordinator & HR Executive
tagsAndSkills: Administrative Skills,Record Keeping,Communication Skills,Computer Proficiency,Team Coordination,HR Administration,Multitasking,Organization Skills
jobDescription:
Job Description: Executive Assistant


Location: Vashi, Navi Mumbai.


Company Overview: Shashwat TV blends the wisdom of Bharatiya culture and heritage with
modern innovation. Focused on sustainable technologies, education, and initiatives, Arka aims
to connect individuals to the rich legacies of Bharat. The company supports local craftsmanship,
holistic wellness, and sustainable living to cultivate a community that values heritage as a
cornerstone for future growth.


Role Description: This is a full-time on-site role as an Executive Assistant at Arka. The
Executive Assistant will provide administrative support, manage expense reports, assist
executives, and facilitate communication within the organization. The role will involve
coordinating schedules, overseeing daily office operations, arranging meetings and
appointments, and handling various administrative tasks to ensure smooth operations in the
office.


Key Responsibilities:
Provide comprehensive administrative support to executives.
Manage and maintain expense reports and records.
Coordinate schedules, appointments, and meetings for executives.
Oversee daily office operations to ensure efficiency.
Facilitate communication within the organization and act as a liaison between executives
and other staff.
Handle confidential information with discretion.
Perform various administrative tasks such as preparing reports, drafting
correspondence, and managing office supplies.
Assist in organising company events and activities.

Qualifications:
Proven experience in executive administrative assistance and providing executive
support.
Proficiency in managing expense reports and other financial records.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Strong administrative assistance skills with attention to detail and problem-solving
capabilities.
Proficiency in organizational and time management skills.
Ability to handle confidential information with discretion.
Proficiency in MS Office and other relevant software.
Experience in [Your Industry/Field] is a plus.
Relevant certification or degree in Business Administration or a related field is preferred.

How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume and cover letter detailing their qualifications and experience to ashwin@thearka.in.
Join Arka and be a part of a team dedicated to bridging the past and the future through
sustainable innovation and cultural heritage.

title: Quality Manager
tagsAndSkills: Quality Management,Net Promoter Score,Process Excellence,Quality Assurance,CSAT,Assurance,Process,.Net
jobDescription:
Role & responsibilities

Quality Manager - UK Travel Domain - Mumbai

  • Total Experience       - 12+ Years
  • Relevant Experience - 1+ years as a Manager (8+ years into quality management domain)
  • Candidates should be from BPO background only
  • Candidates from Mumbai location should apply
  • Work from office opportunity
  • UK Shifts

Summary of Primary Job Responsibilities: 

  • Responsible for devising and establishing Quality procedures, standards and specifications
  • Review customer requirements and make sure they are met and Look at ways to reduce waste and increase efficiency.
  • Set up and maintain controls and documentation procedures.
  • Monitor performance by gathering relevant data and produce statistical reports
  • Measure performance and identify any areas of weakness, recommending and implementing improvements
  • Liaise with other managers and staff and provide training, tools and techniques to enable others to achieve quality standards. Assess the effectiveness of changes made.

Typical Qualifications:

Education:

  • Bachelor's degree in business administration or relevant fields.

Experience Target 

  • Prior experience in quality assurance as a manager or other related roles.
  • 3 plus years experience in an operations/customer service call center environment.
  • Skills: 
  • Strong knowledge of quality assurance standards and methodologies.
  • Excellent managerial, leadership and communication skills.
  • Analytical approach with good numerical skill and understanding of statistical analysis.
  • Keen attention to detail and organizational abilities.
  • Basic knowledge of computers and use of software like MS Office.
  • Knowledge: 
  • Demonstrated experience in managing quality/operations teams in a service environment.
  • Demonstrated ability managing and developing large high performance teams of analysts/managers is required.
  • Must have handled large teams in BPO for Voice & Non Voice process
  • Understands the value of confidentiality and sensitivity of tasks at hand
  • Consistently exhibits honesty in giving reliable solutions/answers to client’s inquiries and or issues
  • Abilities: 
  • Ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced dynamic environment.
  • Clear and logical thinking with an ability to deal with ambiguity.
  • Communicates effectively in a positive manner
  • Excellent Customer Service Skills
  • Demonstrates an ability to be well-organized, efficient and self-disciplined

Special Certifications 

  • Certification in Lean and/or Six Sigma or equivalent, would be preferred

Travel Required

  • Not required

title: Immediate Hiring - Sr. SAP ABAP at Mumbai location
jobDescription:
About the Company:

Castaliaz Technologies Private Limited is an SAP GOLD Partner company. We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced Senior SAP ABAP Consultant to join our dynamic team.


Job Description:

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement SAP ABAP solutions to meet business requirements.
  • Work closely with functional consultants to understand business needs and translate them into technical specifications.
  • Perform code reviews and ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
  • Develop and maintain custom reports, interfaces, conversions, enhancements, forms, and workflows (RICEF).
  • Optimize and enhance existing ABAP programs to improve performance and functionality.
  • Debug and troubleshoot issues in the SAP system and provide effective solutions.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of ABAP developments with other SAP modules.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentoring to junior ABAP developers.
  • Participate in project planning, including defining the technical scope and estimating effort.
  • Prepare technical documentation, including specifications, test scripts, and user manuals.
  • Ensure compliance with SAP security and governance standards.
  • Stay updated with the latest SAP technologies and best practices.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in SAP ABAP development.
  • Proficient in ABAP programming, including reports, forms (AdobeForms, SmartForms, SAPscript), module pool programming, BAPIs, BADIs, user exits, and enhancement points.
  • Strong understanding of SAP modules (e.g., MM, SD, FI, CO, PM, WM, PP) and their integration points.
  • Experience with SAP S/4HANA, ODATA, and Fiori development is a plus.
  • Knowledge of ABAP Objects (OOP) and modern ABAP programming techniques.
  • Familiarity with SAP enhancement frameworks such as user exits, BAdIs, and enhancement spots.
  • Strong debugging and problem-solving skills.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience with SAP HANA and CDS views.
  • Experience with ODATA.
  • Knowledge of SAP UI5 and Fiori development.
  • Experience with SAP Workflow and Process Integration (PI/PO).
  • Understanding of Agile development methodologies.
  • Knowledge of SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP) is highly preferred.


interested candidates can share resume on suvarna.kadam@castaliaz.co.in
